channel.title: Most complete 2006-2007 server?
channel.description:
Hi,
Upon looking through a large amount of the servers and clients that are available for download, I've quickly noticed that everything is incredibly scattered about and modified to varying degrees.
I'm looking for a 2006-2007 server that is unmodified, aka there are not shops moved around in random places, etc, and the client is not messed around with. I want it to feel, look and have the same, working features as real 2006-2007 Runescape had/has.
It should have the same working skills, equipping, items, mini games, etc etc.
Which download would be considered the most "complete"?
Thanks.
